SELECT no,subject,name,regdate,hit,recount,jeadmin,content,num FROM (SELECT no,subject,name,regdate,hit,recount,jeadmin,content,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,subject,name,regdate,hit,recount,jeadmin,content FROM jeju_board_1_2 ORDER BY jeadmin DESC, no DESC)) WHERE
name LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%'
subject LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%'
content LIKE '%'||#{ss}||'%'
